thread.section_title: Vision Direct Australia Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Vision Direct Australia | www.visiondirect.com.au
thread.title: Zella Yue
thread.title_full: Vision Direct Australia reviewed by Zella Yue

author: Zella Yue
title: Zella Yue
text:
Excellent prices, but you might need to visit an optical shop afterwards to get your glasses adjusted to fit. They also don't have as many lens options as optical shops.
My package didn't come with an invoice and I had to contact them for it in order to make a claim with my health insurance. Customer service was helpful though.
Overall, good products at a low cost. Would recommend if you don't have very special fitting or lens requirements.
